item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 11, 2025 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:

26. Native frame transposition coming to Emacs 31 (172 points | 74 comments)
27. Isaac Asimov describes how AI will liberate humans and their creativity (1992) (146 points | 199 comments)
28. Busy Bar (235 points | 125 comments)
29. ELD: A new open-source embedded linker tool for embedded systems (45 points | discuss)
